channel.title: Talks By Janette Hales Beckham
channel.description: General Conference talks by Janette Hales Beckham.

item.title: The Power of Goodness
item.description: At one time a mother said, “I wish they would just lock all the youth in the temple until they turn twenty-one.” A father said, “I feel totally powerless in my own home. We are out of control.” What force or power could soften the human cry for great

item.title: Sustaining the Living Prophets
item.description: There is always a feeling of excitement for me as I know young women are gathering for our annual Young Women meeting. Tonight my excitement feels more like a whisper—the witness of the Holy Ghost whispering to me that a prophet of God has a message

item.title: Modern Pioneers
item.description: We must have faith to walk away from those things that would tear us down or hold us back. … We must have faith in every footstep.

item.title: Making Faith a Reality
item.description: Fundamentals of daily living—scripture reading, prayer, family home evening, the conversation at dinner—these provide the experiences that make faith a reality.
